abstract: China’s energy companies have spent billions of dollars in recent years to gain access to new energy resources.
snippet: China’s energy companies have spent billions of dollars in recent years to gain access to new energy resources.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Sinopec has agreed to invest almost $5.2 billion in the Brazilian operations of Portuguese energy company Galp Energia, the latest move in a global expansion by China’s largest oil refiner.

headline.main: Sinopec Expands in Brazil With Stake in Energy Company
